Contact

I'm always happy to talk about my music, projects you're working on, licensing or commission opportunities, or anything else that's on your mind.

Please feel free to contact me at levi@levipatel.com, via social media, or on my discord server.

Mailing List

My mailing list is the most direct way to connect with me, without any algorithms coming between us. It's also where I like to discuss my projects in more depth, and more openly, than I do elsewhere.

If you're interested, please enter your email address below and I'll keep you up to date.

Discord Server

I've also recently started my own Discord server where I also share more from behind the scenes, trade music recommendations, and generally connect with people who are interested in my work.

Just click the button below to join us, I hope to see you there.

Join Discord
